text: Looking to hire a software engineer who can support us (fintech startup) with the development of a native HubSpot app. Role based in Netherlands, Utrecht. DM if you are interested and live in NL

Aptitude 8 is hiring a developer. Come work among the brightest and best in the HubSpot ecosystem (not me)

<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/3525715351/>
Whoever is thinking about applying. It's worth applying just to have the chance to work with Thomas.
haha, was supposed to sound a little funny but keep the same meaning but I guess it was just kind and not very funny.
We are also hiring a Technical Director if you have the experience & knowledge. <https://aptitude8.com/careers>
